Today I announced a broad #Administrative Reform with the objective of improving public management and increasing the country's competitiveness.
In the reform, we reduced 8 ministries, 30 national secretariats and cut 3 thousand commissioned positions. #AdministrativeRegistry
My own salary, that of the Vice-President and the Ministers of State, will also be reduced by 10%. #AdministrativeRegistry
We will also reduce by 20% expenses with cost and outsourced services, and review the use of all the properties of the Union. #AdministrativeRegistry

Today, we have launched a global development and humanitarian organization that brings together 28 organizations with 1400 development programs targeting 130 million people http://t.co/E10IX9dDai

The Foundation will work in the areas of combating poverty and disease, spreading knowledge, community empowerment and innovation, and will launch the largest comprehensive development program in the Arab region
Global Initiatives will educate 20 million children, protect and treat 30 million people and invest AED 2 billion in establishing hospitals and medical research centers
Mohammed Bin Rashid International's initiatives will invest AED 500 million in water research in the region and support 2 million families to be self-reliant
The new Knowledge Foundation will print 10 million books and translate the world's top 25,000 books and encourage the reading of 500 million books by our Arab students
The Foundation will also support young entrepreneurs to provide more than half a million opportunities, incubate 5,000 innovators and invest 5.5 billion dirhams in creating innovative incubators
We will also train thousands of young Arab leaders in the coming periods, and we have allocated 500 million dirhams to establish a tolerance speech in the Arab region
Our Arab region is undergoing enormous challenges, and we will not turn our backs on our region, but we will help them, and we will instill in the youth a hope http://t.co/0WlA4GvQS1
The world today faces great challenges from terrorism, wars and migrations. The real solution is in development, human development, education, education, and helping to build its future.
Humanitarian and development work today is driven by huge global institutions and the challenges facing our region need institutions of the magnitude of these challenges http://t.co/8rDW6d9kfh

We launched a global dev. & humanitarian foundation gathering 28 entities with 1,400 programs targeting 130 mln people http://t.co/EsdXURoUeA
The Mohammed bin Rashid Global Initiatives is the most holistic world-scale human development institution for the Middle East
The Initiatives cover four areas: fighting poverty and disease, spreading knowledge, empowering communities, and future innovation.
The Initiatives will provide education for 20 mln children, medication for 30 mln people, and AED2 bln for hospitals and medical research.
The Initiatives will invest AED 500 mln in water research in the region and help 2 mln struggling households become self-reliant.
In the Knowledge sector, we will translate 25,000 books into Arabic, print 10 mln books, and inspire children to read 500 mln books.
We will support young entrepreneurs to create more than 500,000 jobs and empower 5000 innovators with AED 5.5 billion for incubators.
We will train thousands of young Arab leaders and invest AED500 million in promoting tolerance in the region.
The world is struggling with terrorism, war and migration. The solution lies in human development: enabling people to build a future.
